mapper.select: select rownum rn, event_ID, NAME_K, NAME_E, AGE, AGEtext, D_DAY, DIRECTOR, ACTOR, GENRE, PAGE, ROUND(AVG, 2) AVG, AVG_NUM, CONTENT, POSTER, event, STEEL1, STEEL2, STEEL3, STEEL4, STEEL5, STEEL6, STEEL7, R_TIME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE from ( select * from gc_event where (STARTDATE <= to_date(#{today})) and (ENDDATE >= to_date(#{today})) order by AVG desc)

select rownum rn, event_ID, NAME_K, NAME_E, AGE, AGEtext, D_DAY, DIRECTOR, ACTOR, GENRE, PAGE, ROUND(AVG, 2) AVG, AVG_NUM, CONTENT, POSTER, event, STEEL1, STEEL2, STEEL3, STEEL4, STEEL5, STEEL6, STEEL7, R_TIME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, (STARTDATE - to_date(#{today})) as dday from ( select * from gc_event where STARTDATE >= to_date(#{today}) order by STARTDATE)
